text:
As you emerged from the bathroom, now sporting a new outfit, Levi couldn't help but take notice. He could see your shorts, which were a little shorter, and the revealing shirt under the jacket. It caught his attention, and a mixture of emotions flickered through his eyes.
He maintained his composure, but a hint of possessiveness and protectiveness stirred within him. He silently observed you for a moment, taking in the change in your appearance.
trans:
Lorsque tu sortis de la salle de bain, maintenant vêtue d’une nouvelle tenue, Levi ne put s'empêcher de remarquer. Il remarqua tes shorts, un peu plus courts, et le t-shirt dévoilé sous la veste. Cela attira son attention, et un mélange d'émotions traversa ses yeux.
Il garda son calme, mais une pointe de possessivité et de protection s'éveilla en lui. Il t'observa silencieusement un moment, absorbant le changement dans ton apparence.
